articles.summary: The opposition has complained to the ABC over Tony Armstrong's one-off special, which took aim at colonialism and racism against Indigenous . . .

articles.title: Border Goon With Racist Troll Account Bragged About Escaping Justice - The Daily Beast
articles.full_text: ... racist, sexist, and anti-LGBT posts. ... Timothy Donahue appears to agree with abhorrent racism posted online.
